Shocking Twister.name: Shocking Twister
Shocking Twister.fullText:
Shock Trooper Attack 11Shocking Twister

Slipping around your enemy, you deliver a series of exact stabs, leaving the foe reeling from three wounds.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength + 2 vs. AC (main weapon)

Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack against the target.

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

  Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. Make a tertiary attack against the target.

  Tertiary Attack: Strength vs. AC (main or off-hand weapon)

  Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, you can shift 1 square, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 34.
Shocking Twister.flavor: Slipping around your enemy, you deliver a series of exact stabs, leaving the foe reeling from three wounds.
Shocking Twister.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Shocking Twister.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Shocking Twister.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, you can shift 1 square, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Shocking Twister.tertiaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (main or off-hand weapon)

Assault Footwork.name: Assault Footwork
Assault Footwork.fullText:
Shock Trooper Utility 12Assault Footwork

With the poise of a seasoned sailor on a storm-tossed deck, you hold your weapons ready to parry, while remaining coiled to dodge.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, once during each of your turns when you miss with a melee attack, you can either shift 1 square or gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 34.
Assault Footwork.flavor: With the poise of a seasoned sailor on a storm-tossed deck, you hold your weapons ready to parry, while remaining coiled to dodge.
Assault Footwork.effect: Until the stance ends, once during each of your turns when you miss with a melee attack, you can either shift 1 square or gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Shocking Skewer.name: Shocking Skewer
Shocking Skewer.fullText:
Shock Trooper Attack 20Shocking Skewer

You grab your foe and yank her toward you, driving your waiting blade in the opposite direction.

Daily        Martial, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding an off-hand weapon and have a hand free.

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength + 5 vs. Fortitude

Hit: You grab the target. Make a secondary attack against it.

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. Reflex

  Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 34.
Shocking Skewer.flavor: You grab your foe and yank her toward you, driving your waiting blade in the opposite direction.
Shocking Skewer.requirement: You must be wielding an off-hand weapon and have a hand free.
Shocking Skewer.onHit: You grab the target. Make a secondary attack against it.
Shocking Skewer.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
